posts.post_content:
Hey everyone, so I've decided that I want to add some Southern Leaguers to my collection. I'm at 5 now. I have: LaFitte, White, Cranston, Ted B. (New Orleans), and Westlake. I am looking for the others now. 
I really would like:
Manion
Hooker
Shag S. 
Violat 
Molesworth
Carey
etc. 

If you have anything, from 1-3 condition, raw or grade, please send me a PM. I am willing to buy, possibly trade. I am also willing to upgrade 4 of my 5 SL'ers that I already own. Please let me know. Thank you.

Maybe even a Hindu ;)
I have about 60-70 raws I'll be posting on BST in the next few days; I know that there are a few SLs in there.
